description: An increase in interest in Asia and artists tapping their own networks have led to a strong showing. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Record nine Singapore artists at Venice Biennale 2024: Trend or blip?
title_page: Record nine Singapore artists at Venice Biennale 2024: Trend or blip? | The Straits Times
maintext:
VENICE – In indulgent and fantastical Venice, wend your way through its alleys and you are likely to hear the unexpected whispers of Singapore artists.
At what is the pre-eminent art gathering of the world, the Venice Biennale, dubbed the “Olympics of art”, no fewer than nine Singapore artists have their works on show in 2024 – a record for the Republic in its 11 years of participation.
